questions.question: Perform partial fraction decomposition.
Determine the antiderivative of the decomposed function.
options: A ln|x| + B(-1/x) + C ln|x-1| (Correct answer)
A ln|x| - B ln|x^2| + C ln|x-1|
A ln|x| + B ln|x^2| - C ln|x-1|
A ln|x| - B ln|x^2| - C ln|x-1|

hints.description: Find improper integral_integrate the function. | [Find improper integral_integrate the function]

questions.question: Evaluate the integral at the limits.
options: lim (a -> 0, b -> 1) [A ln|b| + B(-1/b)  + C ln|b-1| - (A ln|a| + B(-1/a) + C ln|a-1|)] (Correct answer)
lim (a -> 0, b -> 1) [A ln|b| - B ln|b^2| + C ln|b-1| -(A ln|a| - B ln|a^2| + C ln|a-1|)]
lim (a -> 0, b -> 1) [A ln|b| + B ln|b^2| - C ln|b-1| - (A ln|a| + B ln|a^2| - C ln|a-1|)]
lim (a -> 0, b -> 1) [A ln|b| - B ln|b^2| - C ln|b-1| - (A ln|a| - B ln|a^2| - C ln|a-1|)]

hints.description: Find improper integral_integral at the limits. | [Find improper integral_integral at the limits]
